titles.title: Devil's Slide Tunnel Act

Relating to the period of availability of certain emergency relief funds allocated under section 125 of title 23, United States Code, for carrying out a project to repair or reconstruct a portion of a Federal-aid primary route in San Mateo County, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Investigations and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/3/1999--Introduced. Devil's Slide Tunnel Act - Amends Federal highway provisions to make sums allocated for certain project alternatives available until expended (thus ensuring that funds already appropriated and obligated for Devil's Slide, a section of Highway 1 in San Mateo County, California, remain available to the California Department of Transportation to build a tunnel).
